title: Michael Jackson's Vision
overview: Packaged as a deluxe boxed set, Michael Jackson’s Vision contains more than four and a half hours of content across three DVDs, capturing the entire spectrum of Michael’s pioneering short films that transformed the entertainment industry with timeless, pop culture classics that today’s youth embrace with as much passion as their parents did a generation earlier. Michael Jackson's Vision brings together more than 40 videos, ten of them previously unavailable on DVD and each presented in newly restored color and remastered audio. This release marks the first time the video for "One More Chance" was made available to the public.
